Class RSAElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.trapdoorPermutation.RSAElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TPElement

    public final class RSAElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements TPElement
    Concrete class of TPElement for RSA element.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RSAElement(java.math.BigInteger modN)
      Constructor that chooses a random element according to the given modulus.

      Constructor that gets a modulus and a value.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TPElementSendableData generateSendableData()
      This function extracts the actual value of the TPElement and wraps it in a TPElementSendableData that as it name indicates can be send using the serialization mechanism.
      java.math.BigInteger getElement()
      Returns the RSA element.

      • RSAElement

        public RSAElement(java.math.BigInteger modN)
        Constructor that chooses a random element according to the given modulus.

      • RSAElement

        public RSAElement(java.math.BigInteger modN,
                  java.math.BigInteger x,
                  boolean check)
           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor that gets a modulus and a value. If the value is a valid RSA element according to the modulus, sets it to be the element.
        Parameters:
        modN - - the modulus
        x - - the element value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the element is not legal according the modulus
